name: Rig Rat Rush
description:
You're a rat with a gig as the partner in crime to a serial gambler. With luck, anyone can make it big... but relying on luck? As if! Scurry inside the slot machine and slash wires with your trusty coin to earn endless more!

Made for the GMTK 2022 game jam.

Controls

WASD/Arrow Keys: Movement

Space Bar: Jump

CTRL/Mouse : Hold key and move rat mouse to aim

R: Restart level

Credits

Zelveri: 2d art, animation, & design

DarkCoffii: Programming

Jucobee: Programming & design

Yuterk: Slot machine 3d model & animation

Palmtreez: Coin 3d model

Da4RealDeal: Music composer
